turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please order me coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. Where would you like me to get your coffee from? Starbucks or Peets?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks please. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What coffee flavor would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Caramel Macchiato please. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like me to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti please. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like extra milk with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A little more milk please. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about extra sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about extra caramel?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, what comes with it should be enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. How about whipped cream? Would you like to add some?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes please. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Noted. Would you like to add something else to your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be it with my coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. How about cookies or anything from the bakery section?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good suggestion. Just please grab me Cheese Danish please and I am all set. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I will go ahead now to get your coffee and Cheese Danish. I will be right back.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
